DOC.brief_summary: Imagio breast imaging system , opto-acoustic ( OA ) image system design concurrently collect image conjunction diagnostic ultrasound ( co-registered OA B-mode imaging ) . This medical device CE-marking approve use Europe nation . This post-market , non-randomized multi-center surveillance study .
DOC.brief_title: IMAging With Opto-acoustics downgradE BI-RADS claSsificaTion Relative tO Other Diagnostic Methodologies ( MAESTRO )
DOC.detailed_description: This post-market surveillance study prospective , control , multi-center , observational , evaluate Imagio OA downgrade BI-RADS ( Breast Imaging-Reporting Data System ) classification follow CDU ( Conventional Diagnostic Ultrasound ) visualization characterization suspicious mass prior core needle biopsy ( CNB ) excision . Investigators perform CDU reach diagnosis decision biopsy . Imagio OA use reason perform defer CNB ( Core Needle Biopsy ) excision .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Female 18 year age old Have undiagnosed suspicious finding may include one solid complex cystic suspicious mass , classify CDU BIRADS 4a 4b within 3 week baseline Imagio Scan Have condition impediment could interfere intended field view ( within one probe length 4 cm mass ) , ( i.e. , breast implant within previous 12 month , tattoo ) Pregnant lactate Patient receive chemotherapy type cancer within 90 day date screening CDU
